Module io.jenetics.base
Package io.jenetics.internal.math

Class DoubleAdder

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Number
io.jenetics.internal.math.DoubleAdder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<DoubleAdder>
public final class DoubleAdder extends Number implements Comparable<DoubleAdder>
This class implements the the Kahan summation algorithm, which significantly reduces the numerical error when adding double values.
Since:
3.0
Version:
3.0
